constraints.name: substring_repetition_count
constraints.description: 计算所有连续子串中特定模式的最大重复次数之和
constraints.formal: A(t) = Σ B(s) for all contiguous substrings s of t

constraints.name: pattern_deletion
constraints.description: 通过删除零个或多个字符，使得剩余字符形成特定模式的最大重复次数
constraints.formal: B(s) = max number of repeated copies of 'bessie' by deleting zero or more characters from s

constraints.name: cumulative_updates
constraints.description: 字符串的更新是累积的，每次更新后需要重新计算结果
constraints.formal: t' = update(t, p, c); A(t') after each update
